medical_history.chief_complaint: Increasing abdominal pain and vomiting after every meal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began several days prior to presentation, characterized by increasing abdominal pain. The patient reported having a bowel movement on the morning of presentation but has not passed gas for several days. There was no prior similar episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, High Cholesterol, Bipolar Disorder, Melanoma s/p excision.
